data.mean: 最重要的东西；最要紧的事情

fixed_phrase_list.cn: 重要的事，形容词修饰everything要后置

sentence.cn: 是的，但是里面什么都有，炊具、落地窗和洗碗机。

2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

mean.mean: 最重要的东西；最要紧的事情

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to refer vaguely to other things associated with what has been mentioned

lj.lj_ly: you'll still get paid and everything.
lj.lj_ls: 你将仍会得到报酬以及其他东西。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)具有各种吸引力（或优势）

lj.lj_ly: she was articulate, she was fun—it seemed to me she had everything.
lj.lj_ls: 她善于言表，人又风趣——在我看来，她似乎是应有尽有。

entry.def: You use everything to refer to all the objects, actions, activities, or facts in a particular situation.

example.ex: He'd gone to Seattle long after everything else in his life had changed...
example.tran: 他生活中的其他一切都改变了，很久之后他去了西雅图。

example.ex: Early in the morning, hikers pack everything that they will need for the day's hike...
example.tran: 一大早，徒步旅行者们把当天旅行所需的一切都装进包里。

entry.def: You use everything to refer to all possible or likely actions, activities, or situations.

example.ex: 'This should have been decided long before now.' —'We can't think of everything.'...
example.tran: “这个在此之前早该决定了。”——“我们不可能考虑得面面俱到。”

example.ex: Cathy thought that she had the answer to everything...
example.tran: 凯茜觉得她能够处理一切。

entry.def: You use everything to refer to a whole situation or to life in general.

example.ex: She says everything is going smoothly...

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is everything, you mean you consider them to be the most important thing in your life, or the most important thing that there is.
entry.tran: （生命中）最重要的东西，最有价值的东西

example.ex: I love him. He is everything to me...
Crime cases were something that agents solved, and to him the case was everything...
example.tran: 犯罪案件是执法人员要解决的事情，对于他而言，案件就是一切。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something has everything, you mean they have all the things or qualities that most people consider to be desirable.

example.ex: She has everything: beauty, talent, children...
example.tran: 她拥有一切：美貌、才干和子女。

example.ex: It was a garden that had everything. It was rich and wild and beautiful, and exciting.
example.tran: 那个花园里一切尽有，景物丰富多彩、自然、美丽，令人激动。

entry.def: You say 'and everything' after mentioning a particular thing or list of things to indicate that they are only examples and that other things are also involved.

example.ex: He had a bed and a fireplace and everything...
example.tran: 他家里有一张床、一个壁炉及其他物品。

example.ex: We become friends and everything, and we call each other on the phone all the time.
example.tran: 我们成了非常要好的朋友，一直互通电话。

sentences.cn: 他告诉我的情况使一切都成为泡影.
sentences.en: What he told me shattered everything.

sentences.cn: 均衡的膳食、短缺的睡眠以及对万事积极地态度有助于人长寿.
sentences.en: A balance diet enough sleep as well as positive attitude towards everything contribute to longevity.

sentences.cn: 祝你新年快乐,万事如意!
sentences.en: Wish you a happy New Year and the best of everything!

sentences.cn: 我们处于万事万物的边缘.
sentences.en: We were on the verge of everything.

sentences.cn: 既然看来万事俱备,这个会议将为我们的合作铺路.
sentences.en: That would pave the way for a deal , since everything else looks solid.

sentences.cn: 万事皆有代价,要想获得也就意味着要付出努力.
sentences.en: Everything a price and to get it means a price you have to pay.

sentences.cn: 我近来对人生万事,有这个感想.
sentences.en: Lately , I've been having that feeling about everything in life.

sentences.cn: 万事进展顺利.
sentences.en: Everything is shaping up well.

sentences.cn: 世间万物都有它的重要时节,世间万事都有它的重要时刻.
sentences.en: To everything , a season and a time to every purpose.

sentences.cn: 在已拥有几项专利, 并取得自有注册商标 “ 万事吉 ”.
sentences.en: Already have several patents, registered trademarks and made its own " Everything is Kyrgyzstan. "

sentences.cn: 在组织和领导人民生产的事业上,我们也并非万事如意的.
sentences.en: Not everything has turned out satisfactorily in our efforts to organize and guide production.

sentences.cn: 万事起头难.
sentences.en: Everything is hard in the beginning.

sentences.cn: 既然我们已经检查过这项建议,万事俱备, 接下来做什么 呢 ?
sentences.en: Now we've reviewed the proposal and everything is just perfect. What's the next?

sentences.cn: 一切费用记在万事达信用卡上.
sentences.en: Just put everything on my Master Card.

sentences.cn: 万事最后会带来好结果.
sentences.en: Everything worked out in the end.

sentences.cn: 万事有结果.
sentences.en: Everything have its result.

sentences.cn: 现在万事利资金太紧张了, 还不出款来啊.
sentences.en: Now everything is too tight financial benefit, not a paragraph to ah.

sentences.cn: 我从来就没听见过有人向我报告万事齐备的事.
sentences.en: I have never heard anybody report that everything was completely ready.

sentences.cn: 现在证书已经有了, 我想万事俱备.
sentences.en: Now that this is a available, I think everything will be in order.

sentences.cn: 祝福你们在以后的日子里万事如意.
sentences.en: I wish you the best of everything for all the year ahead.

sentences.cn: 万事都有个终结, 黑暗的静寂是个人独有的.
sentences.en: Somewhere there is an end to everything, and the loneness of the dark is one's own.

sentences.cn: 祝你们婚后生活万事如意.
sentences.en: Hoping everything goes well with marriage life.

sentences.cn: 祝福大家在2010年工作, 学习,生活一切顺利,万事如意.
sentences.en: Wish you everything goes well in work, study and life and good luck in 2010.

sentences.cn: 这样就万事大吉了.
sentences.en: Everything went off beautifully.

sentences.cn: 难道万事皆好, 一个缺点也没有 吗 ?
sentences.en: But is everything going well, without any hitch?

sentences.cn: 万事都是为着生计和生死.
sentences.en: Everything revolves around bread and death.

sentences.cn: 万事都有终结,很快这种感觉就过去了.现在,我可以站起身来动身回家了.
sentences.en: That soon passed as everything and presently I was able to stand and start for home.

sentences.cn: 别以为你自己是万事通.
sentences.en: Never suppose yourself knowing everything.

sentences.cn: 万事俱备.
sentences.en: Everything has been put right.

sentences.cn: 这就是万事万物开始和结束的地方.
sentences.en: It is the beginning and the end of and everything.

sentences.cn: 没有人人能够做到万事皆知. 从事期货交易总要面临危险.
sentences.en: It is never possible to know everything about anything. A commodity trader is in constant danger.

Sentence.sentence: A new study of 12,000 workers in 17 countries by Steelcase, a furniture-maker which also does consulting, finds that the best way to ensure employees are engaged is to give them more control over where and how they do their work—which may mean liberating them from having to do everything in collaboration with others.
